amendment.description: An amendment numbered 48 printed in Part D of House Report 118-216 to decrease the salary of the Director of Policy Planning Staff Salman Ahmed to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 166 - 265 (Roll no. 479).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Boebert amendment (A024) Failed by recorded vote: 166 - 265 (Roll no. 479).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
